message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. Would you like to make an offer on it?
I appreciate your offer, Alice, but $9,000 is a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $7,500 for the product. Let me know what you think.

I understand you're looking to save some money, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I still need to make a profit. I can offer you the product for $8,000, which is the lowest I can go. What do you think?
